alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 10 at 2:43AM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 7 inches possible. Wind could gust as high as 50 mph. Near-blizzard conditions possible in the ridges. * WHERE...Portion of southwestern Pennsylvania and northern West Virginia, especially in the ridges. * WHEN...From late Friday night through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Visibility may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. The strong wind and weight of snow on tree limbs may down power lines and could cause sporadic power outages. Whiteout conditions are possible and may make travel treacherous. Gusty wind could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
